website_summaries.verdict: LG's Tone Ultra Bluetooth earphones sit uncomfortably between alternatives that offer better value or performance for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Check ad carefully before buying.
customer_reviews.text: The product was advertised as having retractable earbuds. There was a warning sheet in the box said retractactable earbuds. They do not!! The box also showed extra ear buds pads as part of the contents. There were none!! LG box looked like it had been opened Disappointing purchase. Would not buy from this distributor again.
customer_reviews.author: EddyL

customer_reviews.title: Mic is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: AWEFUL! Callers on the other end could not understand me! Mic is terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Microphone was bad, speakers ok.
customer_reviews.text: People I spoke to on telephone calls reported that my voice was "muffled, almost unreadable". I gave these a good 5 days trial but got so much negative feedback, I returned them. The sound quality I perceived in the earbuds was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Its ok. / came slightly with wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: The product came fine no damage to the box or anything. but there is slight discoloration on the earbuds themselves. Which is fine but that means someone had their hands on them before me. The sound quality is ok. I work in a loud kitchen and so I use earbuds to focus when working. My old pair ( which is why I bought this since its somewhat the same) had much better noise canceling then this pair. It works fine, but it's not airtight. you can hear some noise leak through Id say their fine for everyday use but anything more than that. look elsewhere. Im still upset that my product came a little damaged.
customer_reviews.author: James D miller

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL THE LABEL SAYS IT IS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this headset to replace worn out 4 year old LG. For the spec's indicate, "Ultra Tone".....don't believe it. Believe I should have spend less money and a basic LG rather than hoping for improved sound quality. I don't listen to music at high levels so I can enjoy the fidelity and hear ALL the music has to offer. Really wouldn't recommend you spend money on this unit unless you really don't have anything else to do with you money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Not actually new from  Top Deals Online.
customer_reviews.text: Sold via Top Deals! Online. Received item in a damaged box that had 3-4 labels stacked up saying it was new. I understand this and have no problem with it in an easy return market. However the item’s label that is on the device had all the ink worn off, very obviously showing significant use and it should not be considered new at that point. Returning and will order from different seller. This will be my second pair of these. The first lasted 6-12 mos until one speaker went down, I use these all day everyday and are hard on them, but they are almost exactly what I want from a Bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: Farmboy64

customer_reviews.title: Music play-back sound quality is very good, on bar with Samsung U Pro headset
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Music play-back sound quality is very good, on bar with Samsung U Pro headset; Wire retract mechanism seems way more reliable than HBS-900; Beautiful design and good build quality. Cons: God awful mic as usual, it pick up all nearby noise but make your own voice muffled; Eartips replacement are hard to find,3rd party tips do not fit well; Not sweat-proof, sweat into the power button could cause problems. Severe back pocket signal interruption.
customer_reviews.author: CasualSavage

customer_reviews.title: Worst Experience
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality is worst... Keeps interfering with the Car Bluetooth... and takes over when its supposed to be hear from the car BT Audio. Moreover in general headset quality has became worst.. i had to take it off and go on to the phone mode by hand.. to hear other callers. correctly . My freedom of multitasking has been challenged with this instrument. I am moving on to a different company product.
customer_reviews.author: swetha

customer_reviews.title: Faulty engineering.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of LG for sometime however, these headsets are faulty and drop calls on a continual basis. Not sure what has changed in the engineering but, this has been a common problem with this set for the last 6 months and I have tried multiple model numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Holt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Good in-ear headset. No issues. Only slight issue is the size of the ear piece, they stick out of the ear a little too much. I would like it to be more "profile friendly" (for listening to music while sleeping). Update...Almost 2 years later and this headset is still working wonderfully!!! I use it when working-out, playing basketball, watching my firestick, listening to music while sleeping...almost daily. Super Durable. Keeps a charge forever! Sound is awesome!! Great Price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JBlaze0112

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! LG Tones are a high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I use to have an older model of these and they were great but it was time to upgrade. These new headphones are amazing. The sound quality is so smooth and balanced. I received these headphones yesterday and have been listening to music, making calls and using the speaker. Haven't charged it yet and the battery is still high. Also, a good mic with real noise cancellation is what I was missing with the last headphones. It always picked up all the noise around me and I could barely be heard. These headphones do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Not even close
customer_reviews.text: Said new and clearly came refurbished. Right away I could tell they were used as the box was previously opened and taped, the headset had wear and tear and the left ear bud had static as I pulled it out. After having the hbs 820 for 2 years I really wanted another pair and couldn't find them in stores. I was skeptical about buying online and unfortunately my fears were right. Be aware when purchasing this product. Your experience may vary
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Mic went out after 3 weeks, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought the hunt was over. Keep looking. These only lasted 3 weeks before the microphone went out. The sound is good but it’s useless without the mic. When hooking it up with a navigation app on the phone, the headphone annoying says “Call ended” everytime the navigation announces to turn left/right, etc. I liked that the ear piece retracts. The unit looks good. I wished it works like it’s supposed to. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: bunblebbb

customer_reviews.title: Love them except for the issues with disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: Love them except for the issues with disconnecting. The range on these is not as good as my previous LG model. I've actually had the audio break up with my phone in my pocket which is weird. Love the retractable ear buds and smaller wires, almost don't notice they're attached to cords at all. Would be 5 stars if not for the range issue. Can't really go more than 10-12 feet away without losing audio in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it had more bass like my beats did
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a headset that would last all day. I have finally found it. Just wish it had more bass like my beats did.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch
customer_reviews.text: The item ordered was a NEW HBS-820 but the item I received was an obviously USED HBS-820s even though the box was marked as NEW and the model was HBS-820. I say obviously because the coloring (silver & black) by the ear buds was worn to a basic plastic gray! In addition, when I went to pair with my phone it gave me the model number HBS-820s. But my situation was such that I needed the device, it worked, and decided to keep it but will NEVER order anything from this vendor again!!!!! My 3 star ratings are for the actual device and NOT this vendor, this vendor gets zero stars!
customer_reviews.author: A Dis-satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper model sent (HBS-780) didnt last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Right earphone shorted out 3 months in, left side completely shorted out last week. Noise cancellation was awful although I do work in very noisy environment, others around me have no problem with theirs. I'm now dealing with LG's 12 month manufacturer's warranty and discovered that I infact I didn't receive HBS-820s that I had purchased I received HBS-780s. Besides feeling "ripped off" Im sure LG wont cover the warranty due to this. Be careful purchasing on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie White

customer_reviews.title: Not new at all
customer_reviews.text: This item was not new and did not come in a box or with any extra earbud rubber or any other manuals. Was still dirty from previous use and had scratches and dents on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Davis

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them 2 months ago. They sound great, but one day after my support period ends. The head phones initiates random phone calls via my phone. I have sent an email to the vendor to see if they are willing to help or replace the item. I hope so they were over $80. I tried to call LG directly but can't get through of course.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsan

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect headphones for any situation
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - unobtrusive - comfortable - very very long battery life - great sound quality and noise cancelation - intuitive controls Cons: Only real problem I’ve run into is that one or both of the ear pieces lose sound entirely after 6-12months of regular use. My guess is this is because there’s no way to really stop the wires from spinning and eventually fraying or disconnecting.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Totally stay away from these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Been a long time far of LG headphones, but these were a total POS. These headphones didn't even last a month of use in the gym. Not sure if it's from the sweat it something else, but they started trying to redial my last phonr call over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: MHecker

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Disconnecting Not Happy at all!!
customer_reviews.text: I had 800 & 810's. The 810 was the best one I had. I got them wet in the pool so I broke down and got the 820's not happy at all!!!! Sounds ok but keeps disconnecting from my phone on a full charge and 2 feet from it. Need to find a replacement and might have to go to a different brand. issue on iPhone 6plus & 7 , also does it on ipad air as well. NOT HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are not an upgrade from 810
customer_reviews.text: My older 810 set had much better sound and greater volume maximum. Nail in the coffin is these are still plagued by the ever infuriating random bluetooth disconnect and reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the HBS820,
customer_reviews.text: I bought a HGS750 while back and was pretty happy but the wire detached. I thought I was upgrading. These head phones lack enough bass to may listening enjoyable. They also increased the size of the ear steam, even with the smallest ear buds, the discomfort eventually gives me headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Armando V.

customer_reviews.title: Third time's the charm
customer_reviews.text: After trying 2 other headsets after my old LG bluetooth gave out, I went back to LG. It costs a little more, but it's worth it. Great LG sound, love the retractable earbuds, doesn't move around on my neck as much as my old bluetooth, and has easy to use features. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Peckedtodeathbychickens

customer_reviews.title: Stayed strong after 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: I’m mostly impressed by the battery life, sometimes I even forget to charge it. My first Bluetooth that lasted almost 2 days without a charge. I’m loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Bola O. Jaiyeola

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the sound other people heard when I called them ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the sound other people heard when I called them and used this Bluetooth headset. Hard to understand my conversation while wearing the headset around my neck. I have to pick up the left side of the unit and hold it to my mouth to be understood by the people I am calling. Would not buy this again. Listening to music or videos is fine. Feels like I purchased a glorified Bluetooth SPEAKER!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: poor bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: this unit has chronic issues with loosing the bluetooth signal. I spend my day on the headset and it is cycling on/off and on /off at least 10 times through out the day during calls. Sending it back for warranty replacement.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Last time I will buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have had them before, but the quality has declined over the years. It worked for just a few months before it quit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pair at the same time. Yes they sound good and all but the buttons kept getting stuck on both pair. They kept dialing the last number on my call list. It would mute my phone and I didn’t any control of what it would do. They did it intermittently. At the end of the day I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LG head set
customer_reviews.text: I had to return headphone because call would drop with them on . I contact LG I was still under warranty and they sensed me a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product. Could be louder.
customer_reviews.text: I use these everyday. I have had lg headsets in the past. My last pair lasted 5 years, and I work construction, so that says a lot. Haven’t had this pair long, maybe a month, but they are a nice pair. Not as loud as I would like, for music, but not terrible. Love the retractable buds. My other ones got in the way all the time
customer_reviews.author: Blake Began

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Unit came in not working. Would not power on. The pause/play button was also stuck inside the casing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McGee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband in 2017, he has worn them everyday since. Last month he noticed the left side getting loose. I had purchased the insurance when I ordered them so I got in touch with Asurion they had me send them in (they emailed a prepaid UPS label). When they arrive I will receive a prepaid card and order the new one(The same LG).
customer_reviews.author: Pam Adamek

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've use the LG Tone series for years now. Sound quality for conversation seems ok. Music is pretty good as well. Too soon to tell about durability yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My last pair was more expensive but lasted 3 yrs. these are more flexible and I like the material doesn’t make neck sweaty. Battery life is huge plus !
customer_reviews.author: Jody Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are comfortable and the battery life lasts about 12-14 hours of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Emens.Travels

customer_reviews.title: Get a different model
customer_reviews.text: This product was ordered in July and has stopped working. People are unable to hear the person using the blue tooth. I've been trying to get ahold of the seller but can't find an email or anything. I'm very frustrated. A device like this should last more than 5 months!
customer_reviews.author: Becca E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what I ordered. It was in excellent condition, very easy to install, and works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Thompson

customer_reviews.title: LG isn't the great choice for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have poor sound output of the right ear piece. No volume after 3 months of use. Returned to manufacture, the manufacturer replaced the unit. 9 months later, I have the same problem. I tried to have them replaced, company told me they're out of warranty. Two bad units inside 12 months. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: naughtyoncloud9

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality and mic performance
customer_reviews.text: Hi I got this assuming there will be quality sound by JBL. I have JBL bluetooth speakers. Unfortunately sound loudness and quality is not so great. Also Mic is not sensitive and the call volume on the other end is pretty low. Not happy with this purchase. Design is good it is light weight and chord gets nicely attached,
customer_reviews.author: Sankaran

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I love that the headset has separate controls for music and calls.
customer_reviews.author: William Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a headset that had pretty decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a flexible headset. One at 1 that my husband could learn how to use. Wanted a headset with retractable earbuds. Wanted a headset that had pretty decent sound. This one has worked very well and I am pleased with this product. I definitely would recommend this headset!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is low compared to the 810. And it's longer in the neck area.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought them “Used - Like New”. They were indeed like new, in original packaging. They are a little bulky, but so far well worth the money. Much much better than the Best Buy Insignia brand I recently bought that quit working within weeks.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality than their older models.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 2 older model LG’s in the past and this one by far is no where as good. Volume is much lower adjusted all the way up, I can move 20 feet away from my phone in the same room and it will lose contact. Battery lasts about half the time as the older models. Just not as good as other older models I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable set you'll buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth head set. Sometimes I don't even realize I'm wearing it. It's so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: manu scaria

customer_reviews.title: Might be refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Headphones did not work on the left side. They were not in original packaging so maybe they are refurbished. I cannot rate the battery life because I didn't use them.
customer_reviews.author: nancy anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is quite nice, JBL seems to sound a lot better compared to the Harman Kardan LG products they offer. Only complaint I have is that the headphones are a little flimsy for spending 70-80 dollars on them, buttons do feel nice to use. Other than that buy these headphones they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Their Headset products going down hill fast!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because we have really liked the other noise canceling set by LG....but wow did this product take a dive. The sound quality, horrible. Background noise it picked up and heard over my voice on calls. Battery life, doesn't even last until noon. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seriously

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t order again
customer_reviews.text: Does not have good sound. No one can understand me when I talk. LG has went downhill
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Having trouble with connectivity.. the device will power ...
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble with connectivity.. the device will power on and tell me it connects, I'll get a phone call and will not have a connection
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It still works after 2 years. The only thing is i have to charge it and leave it on at all times...... otherwise it starts vibrating until it kills battery. This happens when i turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the on and off switch irritates my neck but it worked ok for a while.
customer_reviews.author: james l cook

customer_reviews.title: Buy the 810 instead
customer_reviews.text: People can hardly hear me when I talk on this and the sound quality is not very good. The 810 was a much much better unit.
customer_reviews.author: JOEL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great clarity. Good fit. Easy to use. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Naquin

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: Hi,This specific LG TONE didn't expect my wishes,maybe because it was refurbished, for example voice canceling system wasn't so good working but as unsaid maybe it was refurbished that's the reason,Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lg headset better than the ear only
customer_reviews.text: I have had all the logs. This one is the best. My daughter has her for a year. I had mine for two months.
customer_reviews.author: FIA

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: LG HBS-810 was a much better head set. The sound and battery on the 820 are comparable but the micro phone is terrible. Constantly having to repeat myself when I’m speaking to someone on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Price

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected
customer_reviews.text: Using this primarily for calls. Noise cancellation less than expected. Connection with iPhone (7) inconsistent. Just decent enough to listen to music inflight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Siem

customer_reviews.title: Voice and sound is not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the microphone on this head set. It is very easy to cover the mic accidentally and then your voice is muffled. The sound is alright but a little tinny. I missed my window to return them or I would have returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I just got a used and dusty Bluetooth as opposed to a newer device. The sound quality is extremely poor. I had to have both my phobe and my Bluetooth volumes up to maximum for me to hear a sound.....I'm returning it right away to the seller
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Received as advertised and on time fully charged and in great like new condition. No user manual but downloaded it online so all good. Very happy with them especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: tuzley

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this product. It is so bad
customer_reviews.text: This product only works for 3 months, Has static and the left sido not working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love it! Arrived quickly. I use it for work and working out every day!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Zboralski

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: 2nd Set. Love the fact that the ear pieces are retractable. Sound is OK. Good for taking on the phone. Music is clear but no real deep bass.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Everyone in my family has a pair!!
customer_reviews.author: MelW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have now recommended this product to about two or three friends
customer_reviews.author: Ana Montes

customer_reviews.title: Microphone muffles sound.
customer_reviews.text: Callers on other end complained I sounded muffled and unable to hear what I spoke. Had to continuously turn off bt and use phone. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SweetPys

customer_reviews.title: This model does have better sound and better retractable earbuds than the 900 series ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th LG Tones Bluetooth of various models. This model does have better sound and better retractable earbuds than the 900 series model.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Never buy this headphone!
customer_reviews.text: This headphone sucks! I would usually buy headphones for no more that $40, but I said to myself, let me just get an expensive one that would last longer, oh boy! I was wrong, this is the worst headphones I've ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the 810
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was no where as good as my 810's that I had..
customer_reviews.author: John h

customer_reviews.title: Mic is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is phenomenal on these but the microphone not so much every one I talked to could barely here me I honestly don't recommend the 820's but the 810's are really good mic and speaker work good
customer_reviews.author: Toni Zickefoose

customer_reviews.title: seems okay but microphone leaves something to be desired people ...
customer_reviews.text: seems okay but microphone leaves something to be desired people have trouble hearing me was not aq problem with my 810's
customer_reviews.author: David Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Works great last me nearly 2 weeks with heavy usage mainly ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great last me nearly 2 weeks with heavy usage mainly phone calls with a little music mixed in. I have one ear that's bad and I can hear great with these
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not the best LG headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love LG's but these have not lasted very long. They have my voice very muffled and no one can hear me when I speak. These are only useful for listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Callers could not hear me.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this. Callers on the other end of my line could not hear me. They said my voice sounded muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: No charging cable
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with a charger or usb cable and extra earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Melgar

customer_reviews.title: No one can here me. Don’t buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst wireless headphones I’ve ever had. Since day one people have had trouble hearing me and it’s now to the point they’re unusable. Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Finally one of these things with a somewhat tolerable battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my apple EarPods and needed something wireless as this is one of the ONLY Bluetooth devices with a 11 to 12 hour battery life I don’t have recharge it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Science Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Product ear piece wouldn’t retract after a month of using. Now I have to send it off to get repaired. For 100 dollars, they should last longer then that.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor bass and noise cancelation.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is awful. Literally no bass at all. And disappointing because I’ve bought LG headsets before. It sounds like you’re listening to music from the other room.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: for a JBL system the bass is tinny. Returned ...
customer_reviews.text: for a JBL system the bass is tinny. Returned and bought the HBS 800s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have the best stereo sound. I had an older version that sounded so much better. They okser ones were not compatible with my new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Shaub

customer_reviews.title: Past return date
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, callers have trouble hearing me, now after 30 days cannot return. I have owned many LG tone earbuds and these are by far worst ever.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Killebrew

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in about two months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for just over a month. Then it quit. Apparently there’s only a one month return policy on it. Therefore, I’d suggest that you not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: I like them real well
customer_reviews.text: I like them real well, but the slight difference in the magnetic the earbuds does not stay put maybe we could have a stronger magnet that holds the earbuds to the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: ashley burton

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: People receiving my calls have complained that they can not hear me. The common complaint is that my voice is muffled and unintelligible. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! The best earphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Best earphones I’ve ever had! Super easy to use, long battery life. Love the retractable ear buds! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Deason

customer_reviews.title: Avg quality...
customer_reviews.text: The headsets right ear keeps going in and out. It also loosed connection during longer calls and has to be reconnected to the device.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yanni

customer_reviews.title: Probably bought a dud
customer_reviews.text: Bought product used it for work jamming out to music it works good. For phone calls the person I am trying to talk to can’t hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Getzandanner

customer_reviews.title: Sound is sometimes muffled. I have tried but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is sometimes muffled. I have tried but I can't really walk very far with out the headset cutting out. I would not buy this particular one again.
customer_reviews.author: Kara J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a comfortable set and these work great
customer_reviews.author: YoMom4lyfe

customer_reviews.title: No one can hear me clearly on this headset ! drops calls battery life is full.
customer_reviews.text: Is only good for listening to music no one can hear me on phone calls drops in middle of converstaion these are a damaged item. I have had these before never had any of these issues.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: Nobody could understand me. It also drop calls really bad.

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this and it only lasted for 2 months.

customer_reviews.title: Function great and as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I rated this item 2 stars because it only last for 2 to 3 months before the connectivity problems begins to surface.

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this headset but the neck band is not very strong. The neck band broke and it is hard to use now.

customer_reviews.text: The sound is awesome but the noise cancelling dont work very good

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. I had these headphones previously, bought from Best Buy so I was spektical of buying them on here. However, they are just the same and I love them!!

product_meta.title: LG Tone Ultra HBS-820 Bluetooth Wireless Stereo Headset - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackExperience exceptional audio quality with the next generation LG TONE ULTRA featuring JBL Signature Sound for powerful acoustic performance. As a premium Bluetooth wireless stereo headset, the LG TONE ULTRA allows for ultimate control of your audio experience with retractable earbuds, Quad-Layer Speaker Technology, and Dual MEMS Microphones for crystal clear voice clarity. Its sleek, contour design fits easily around your neck for a lightweight, comfortable style for the audio enthusiast looking for an exceptional wireless experience.
feature_bullets: JBL Signature Sound – tuned by JBL for high-quality acoustic performance
Retractable Earbuds – an intuitive wire management solution with a comfortable, customized fit
Dual MEMS Microphones – delivers exceptional voice clarity for uninterrupted conversations
Quad-Layer Speaker Technology – balanced audio and less distortion and the product is Qualcomm aptX compatible
Around-the-Neck Wearing Style – lightweight, comfortable contour with smooth, seamless style.Standby Time Up to 30 days
